job.title: Robosoft Technologies - .Net/C# Developer - ASP/WebAPI/SQL Server
job.description: Job Description :- Having experience in C#, ASP.NET, NET Framework 4.0+.- ASP.NET Web Forms &amp; MVC, Win Forms, WCF/Web API, C# /(C Sharp), JavaScript &amp; J Query, Stored Procedures (SQL Server/My SQL), CSS-<br><br>Excellent Knowledge of Object Oriented Programming and MVC.-<br><br>Excellent knowledge of SQL with ability to write complex queries, Triggers and stored procedures-<br><br>Working experience in WPF, WCF, Web services, XML, JSON will be preferred-<br><br>Knowledge of web technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, and JQuery would be given preference.- Ability to communicate regarding work related verbal and written .- Required soft skills to work in a team (ref:hirist.com)
